audioText: La douceur de sa voix plaisante toujours aux enfants qui l'écoutent attentivement.
question: What effect does this person's voice have on children?
options: The gentleness of their voice always pleases children who listen carefully
Their loud voice frightens children and makes them run away
Their strict tone makes children behave immediately
Their singing voice puts children to sleep
explanation: The text states 'La douceur de sa voix plaisante toujours aux enfants qui l'écoutent attentivement' - The gentleness of their voice always pleases children who listen to them carefully. The noun 'douceur' (gentleness) and verb 'plaisante' (pleases) describe an appealing voice quality.
